bioAsHtml: Felix Schulze is a mobile evangelist. Currently Felix is leading the mobile software development department with the agile teams for Android, iOS and Mobile Web at AutoScout24. He also gives a lot of talks about continuous integration in the app development. He has been working on app development since the first iOS SDK release. First he was focused on iOS development but started soon to develop also for the Android platform. He also gives a lot of talks about continuous integration in the app development. You could find him also on Twitter as @x2on or find an overview of him at his website www.felixschulze.de.
